data.name: Beers and Boomerangs
data.description:
Cook and bring drinks to your mates, but don't forget to defend your BBQ from those pesky kangaroos!

A VR game where you throw boomerangs at kangaroos that are trying to steal your beer! Cook and bring drinks to your mates, but don't forget to defend your BBQ from those pesky kangaroos!  

-- 1 Year Update --
Thanks for an epic year of boomerangs, beers, and roo chaos! Dive into the fun. Here's to another year of awesome boomerang battles!

We reduced the price by 75% and added new game modes! Go and explore

changelog.change_log:
- Added arcade Zen mode
 - Added new hard mode
 - Added new red stars that can be earned by passing levels in hard mode
 - Small minor fixes and improvements

Features:
- Added \"easy\" mode!! The game was a tad hard, so we made it easier so you can share it with your non-VR-expert friends
- Added a Spatula and a Gun Boomerang as rewards for reaching Wave 20 in the arcade

Improvements:
- Increased time until drinks start warming up from 5 secs to 8 secs
- Updated the game icon
- Added extra clue to how to select a boomerang skin -> put them in your pockets!
- Make boomerangs not flop when touching each other -> Dual throwing is way better now!
- Make \"drinks lost display\" transparent when the player is nearby
- Improve menu buttons so you don't have to aim as much

Bug Fixes:
- Fix snag and burger bug where the burger keeps on grilling outside of the grill
- Fix tinyroo not being properly grilled when "ragdoll mode" was on

- Minor improvements and bug fixes
 - Added experimental section in settings and optional ragdoll physics in tiny roos

- Minor fixes and improvements to beach levels
 - Minor fixes and improvements to leaderboards and achievements

- Fix translations
 - Add credits
 - Balance boss fights

Updated Boss fights, Improved Lightmaps, Fixed German Translations.
Improved autoaim stuff, general QOL improvements
Demo - Uploading to test Oculus publishing
